name: socialmedia
description: Social Media for education and professional sharing

scripts.bundle-js: browserify lib/cardtemplate.js > static/cardtemplate.js && browserify lib/loadposts.js > static/loadposts.js && browserify lib/postscript.js > static/postscript.js && browserify lib/autologin.js > static/autologin.js && browserify lib/loginchecker.js > static/loginchecker.js && browserify lib/registrationvalidator.js > static/registrationvalidator.js   && browserify lib/profileloader.js > static/profileloader.js  && browserify lib/logouthandler.js > static/logouthandler.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run bundle-js

author: PCH
